channel.title: Comments on: If I got even a penny for every time this randomly happens in this game

item.title: By: AccidentEasy3763
item.dc:creator: AccidentEasy3763
item.description: This Time next year you could be a millionaire
item.content:encoded: This Time next year you could be a millionaire

item.title: By: Jobomb3010
item.dc:creator: Jobomb3010
item.description: Strange how this game came out completely broken and greedy, and is still completely broken and only less greedy. It's almost as if they don't care.
item.content:encoded: Strange how this game came out completely broken and greedy, and is still completely broken and only less greedy. It’s almost as if they don’t care.
